SwitchPreference.android:summary: Restricted to maximum of 1 with dynamic ISF

Preference.android:summary: Eating Now operates within the Start and End time specified.\nLarger boluses from the Eating Now Window are allowed within this time range.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: Enter Eating Now start time in 24h e.g. 9AM is 9
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: Start Time

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: Enter Eating Now end time in 24h e.g. 17 is 5PM. Finish time of the next day is fully supported.
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: End Time

SwitchPreference.android:title: Enable EN after EN Start Time
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow EN to become active automatically after EN start time without COB or manual bolus entry.

Preference.android:summary: SMB's can be restricted inside and outside of the Eating Now time range.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: Daytime SMB Restriction
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: There will be no SMB when below this BG offset during the day unless COB or a TT lower or equal to normalTarget\ne.g. if normalTarget is 5.5 (99) and this setting is 1.5 (27) there will be no SMB below 7.0 (126)

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: Overnight SMB Restriction
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: There will be no SMB when below this BG offset at night unless COB or a TT lower or equal to normalTarget\ne.g. if normalTarget is 5.5 (99) and this setting is 1.5 (27) there will be no SMB below 7.0 (126)
Max IOB for EN. Once reached the maxBolus will fallback to either AAPS maxBolus or TBR.
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: Maximum IOB for Eating Now

SwitchPreference.android:title: Allow SMB when EN Max IOB exceeded

PreferenceCategory.android:title: Eating Now: ENW
PreferenceCategory.android:summary: Settings for within the EN Window.

Preference.android:summary: The EN Window becomes active when there is a manual bolus,carb entry or when IOB above trigger value, only after the Start Time setting.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: EN Window IOB Trigger
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: Enable EN Window when IOB is over this amount of units.\n0 will not use this feature and rely on COB or manual bolus entries.\nThe EN Window will remain active until IOB falls below this threshold.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: EN Window Min Bolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: EN Window will not be activated with boluses below this amount.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Allow ENW Overnight
SwitchPreference.android:summary: ENW will be active after EN End Time with COB or EN-TT.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use GhostCOB after ENW
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Ignore COB after EN Window and rely on UAM predictions.

Preference.android:summary: The first manual bolus or carb entry is considered breakfast, or the first meal of the day.\nThe time of the first meal of the day may vary. ISF and CR scaling can be applied to a single ISF/CR profile entry allowing flexibility without profile shifts.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: EN Breakfast Window Duration
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: Window in minutes for increased maxBolus with COB or UAM.\n0 will disable and allow AAPS maxBolus limit.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: Breakfast ISF/CR Percentage
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage:
* ONLY TO BE USED WHEN A SINGLE ISF AND CR ENTRY IS WITHIN THE PROFILE *
The breakfast ISF/CR will use the profile and scale as a percentage.
100 will be no change.
150 will make the breakfast ISF and CR 150% stronger than profile.
This setting will be active for the duration of the EN Window.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: Breakfast COB maxBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage:
Breakfast COB maxBolus for BGL rises within the EN Window.
This will use ISF/CR percentage scaling if enabled.
If this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.
0 will use existing maxBolus limit

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: Breakfast UAM maxBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage:
Breakfast UAM maxBolus for BGL rises within the EN Window.
This will use ISF/CR percentage scaling if enabled.
If this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.
0 will use existing maxBolus limit
Max Units within Breakfast ENW (boluses only). Once reached the maxBolus will fallback to AAPS maxBolus. Will continue until ENW is inactive, max 4h. 0 will disable the function.
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: Breakfast ENW Max Units

Preference.android:summary: An ENW duration, larger COB and UAM maxBolus may also be defined within the EN Window for subsequent meals.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: EN Window Duration
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: Window in minutes for increased maxBolus with COB or UAM.\n0 will disable and allow AAPS maxBolus limit.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: ENW ISF/CR Percentage
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage:
* ONLY TO BE USED WHEN A SINGLE ISF AND CR ENTRY IS WITHIN THE PROFILE *
The ISF/CR will use the profile and scale as a percentage.
100 will be no change.
150 will make the ISF and CR 150% stronger than profile.
This setting will be active for the duration of the EN Window.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: UAM maxBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: UAM maxBolus for all BGL rises without COB within the EN Window.\nIf this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.\n0 will use existing AAPS maxBolus limit and -1 will only disable SMB and use TBR only.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: COB maxBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: COB maxBolus for BGL rises within the EN Window.\nIf this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.\n0 will use existing AAPS maxBolus limit and -1 will only disable SMB and use TBR only.
Max Units within ENW after breakfast (boluses only). Once reached the maxBolus will fallback to AAPS maxBolus. Will continue until ENW is inactive, max 4h. 0 will disable the function.
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: ENW Max Units
Outside ENW maxBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: maxBolus for BGL rises outside the EN Window.\nIf this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.\n0 will use existing AAPS maxBolus limit and -1 will only disable SMB and use TBR only.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: BG+ maxBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: BG+ maxBolus for when there is resistance and BG is stuck higher than target.\n0 will use disable and -1 will disable SMB and use TBR only.

Preference.android:summary: UAM+ is similar to the Boost plugin. UAM+ PreBolus can boost the BG to trigger an initial bolus for UAM. UAM+ can also be used outside the ENW to provide larger UAM boluses.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: UAM+ Breakfast PreBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: UAM+ Breakfast PreBolus maxBolus for initial UAM BG rise within the EN-TT Window.\nIf this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.\n0 will use existing EN UAM maxBolus limit.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: UAM+ Breakfast maxBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: UAM+ Breakfast maxBolus for accelerated UAM BG rise within the EN-TT Window.\nIf this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.\n0 will disable UAM+ and fallback to usual UAM prediction.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: UAM+ PreBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: UAM+ PreBolus maxBolus for initial UAM BG rise within the EN-TT Window.\nIf this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.\n0 will use existing EN UAM maxBolus limit.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: UAM+ maxBolus
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: UAM+ maxBolus for accelerated UAM BG rise within the EN-TT Window.\nIf this value is larger than maxIOB it will be considered to be minutes of basal.\n0 will disable UAM+ and fallback to usual UAM prediction.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Allow UAM+ SMB outside ENW
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow UAM+ to provide an EN UAM+ maxBolus SMB when not within ENW.\nSimilar to Boost plugin this will activate with sufficient delta and acceleration.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Allow UAM+ restricted SMB with TBR outside ENW
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow UAM+ to provide a non ENW SMB with TBR when not within ENW.\nSimilar to Boost plugin this will activate with sufficient delta and acceleration.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use dynamic ISF
SwitchPreference.android:summary: As BG increases ISF will become stronger when enabled.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: ISF BG Scaler
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage:
As BG increases ISF will become stronger.
The level of scaling can be adjusted.
0 = normal scaling, 5 is 5% stronger, -5 is 5% weaker ISF scaling.
Recommended setting is 0.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use TDD for ISF
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Use TDD as the basis for calculating the current ISF. This will override the profile ISF.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: This will use a percentage of the calculated TDD ISF. If TDD ISF is too strong it can be reduced e.g. 75 will use 75% of the calculated TDD ISF.
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: TDD ISF Scaling
MaxISF %
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage:
Profile ISF will be used with this as a percentage.
100 will limit TDD based ISF to profile ISF.
150 will allow an ISF that is 150% stronger than profile.
0 is no limit.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use TDD based SensitivityRatio
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Use recent TDD history to calculate current SensitivityRatio. Used for basal only. Min/Max Autosens values will be respected.

info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:title: TIRS % resistance per hour
info.nightscout.core.validators.Validati.android:dialogMessage: ISF will become stronger every loop iteration when bg is high. This will set Maximum resistance per hour in percentage. MaxISF is respected.

PreferenceCategory.android:title: Eating Now: Experimental Variant
PreferenceCategory.android:summary: New features that are being tested within Experimental Variant. DO NOT USE.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use 3PM Basal ISF Variance
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Use 3PM Basal as the basis for ISF changes. The basal at 3PM is taken as the basis for baseline ISF.\nBasal variation from this point is used to scale the ISF, stronger basal will make ISF weaker.\nOnly use when the profile uses a single ISF for 24 hours and the basal profile is fully populated.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use LCTDD for ISF
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Use last cannula TDD as the basis for calculating the current ISF. This will override the profile ISF.
